pages.text: The $(thing)help tab$() of the $(thing)Advent GUI$() is the last tab on the list, accessed by the button at the bottom of the left-panel menu.
pages.title: Help Tab

pages.text: The tab contains a brief text section giving some helpful information on the mod, a handful of important links to sites related to the mod, a theme selector, and a randomly selected tip that changes each time the tab is opened.$(br2)Changing the theme via the theme selector changes the entire GUI's theme and will save through game restarts.
